languages.text: "Благодарю, что ответили на мой запрос, Вольный Торговец. Я прибыл по поручению маршала Стракса, чтобы просить у вас помощи — необходимо взять на абордаж корабль еретика, укравшего десятину, казнить вора и вернуть священную подать под охрану арбитров. Вашей наградой станет вражеский фрегат "Бессердечный", который мы захватим во время миссии".

"Thank you for responding to my request, Rogue Trader. I am here on the orders of Marshal Strachs to ask for your help. We are in pursuit of a tithe thief. We must board the thief's ship, execute the heretic for his crimes, and return the sacred tribute to the protection of the Adeptus Arbites. The reward for your assistance in this matter will be the thief's frigate, the Heartless, which we will capture in the course of the mission."
languages.original_text: "Благодарю, что ответили на мой запрос, Вольный Торговец. Я прибыл по поручению маршала Стракса, чтобы просить у вас помощи — необходимо взять на абордаж корабль еретика, укравшего десятину, казнить вора и вернуть священную подать под охрану арбитров. Your reward for your assistance in this matter will be the thief's frigate, the Heartless, which we will capture in the course of the mission."

The reward for your assistance in this matter will be the thief's frigate, the Heartless, which we will capture in the course of the mission."

languages.text: «Gracias por atender mi solicitud, Comerciante Independiente. Vengo por orden del Mariscal Strachs para pedir su ayuda en la búsqueda y captura de un ladrón de diezmo. Debemos abordar la nave del ladrón, ejecutar al hereje por sus crímenes y devolver el sacro tributo a la protección del Adeptus Arbites. La recompensa por asistirnos en esta operación será la fragata del ladrón, la Desalmada, que será capturada en el transcurso de la misión».
languages.original_text: "Thank you for responding to my request, Rogue Trader. I am here on the orders of Marshal Strachs to ask for your help. We are in pursuit of a tithe thief. We must board the thief's ship, execute the heretic for his crimes, and return the sacred tribute to the protection of the Adeptus Arbites. The reward for your assistance in this matter will be the thief's frigate, the Heartless, which we will capture in the course of the mission."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias por atender mi solicitud, Comerciante Independiente. Vengo por orden del Mariscal Strachs para pedir su ayuda en la búsqueda y captura de un ladrón de diezmo. Debemos abordar la nave del ladrón, ejecutar al hereje por sus crímenes y devolver el sacro tributo a la protección del Adeptus Arbites. La recompensa por asistirnos en esta operación será la fragata del ladrón, la Desalmada, que será capturada en el transcurso de la misión».

languages.text: “感谢你回应我的请求，行商浪人。我奉斯塔克斯元帅之命，前来此地寻求你的帮助。目前，我们正在追捕某个盗窃帝国什一税的窃贼。我们必须登上那个窃贼的船，处决那个异端罪犯，让神圣的贡品重新归于帝国法务部的守护之下。我们会在执行任务的过程中夺取窃贼的‘无心号’护卫舰级舰船，而那艘护卫舰将会当做谢礼。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you for responding to my request, Rogue Trader. I am here on the orders of Marshal Strachs to ask for your help. We are in pursuit of a tithe thief. We must board the thief's ship, execute the heretic for his crimes, and return the sacred tribute to the protection of the Adeptus Arbites. The reward for your assistance in this matter will be the thief's frigate, the Heartless, which we will capture in the course of the mission."

traits.locale_text: “感谢你回应我的请求，行商浪人。我奉斯塔克斯元帅之命，前来此地寻求你的帮助。目前，我们正在追捕某个盗窃帝国什一税的窃贼。我们必须登上那个窃贼的船，处决那个异端罪犯，让神圣的贡品重新归于帝国法务部的守护之下。我们会在执行任务的过程中夺取窃贼的‘无心号’护卫舰级舰船，而那艘护卫舰将会当做谢礼。”

languages.text: « Merci d'avoir répondu favorablement à ma requête, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Le maréchal Strachs m'envoie quérir votre aide. Nous sommes à la poursuite d'un voleur de dîme. Nous devons arraisonner son vaisseau, exécuter l'hérétique pour ses crimes et rendre le tribut sacré à la garde de l'Adeptus Arbites. Pour prix de votre assistance, nous vous offrons la frégate du renégat, le Sans-Cœur, que nous saisirons dans le cadre de l'opération. »
languages.original_text: "Thank you for responding to my request, Rogue Trader. I am here on the orders of Marshal Strachs to ask for your help. We are in pursuit of a tithe thief. We must board the thief's ship, execute the heretic for his crimes, and return the sacred tribute to the protection of the Adeptus Arbites. The reward for your assistance in this matter will be the thief's frigate, the Heartless, which we will capture in the course of the mission."

traits.locale_text: « Merci d'avoir répondu favorablement à ma requête, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Le maréchal Strachs m'envoie quérir votre aide. Nous sommes à la poursuite d'un voleur de dîme. Nous devons arraisonner son vaisseau, exécuter l'hérétique pour ses crimes et rendre le tribut sacré à la garde de l'Adeptus Arbites. Pour prix de votre assistance, nous vous offrons la frégate du renégat, le Sans-Cœur, que nous saisirons dans le cadre de l'opération. »

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダー、私の要請に応えてくれてありがとうございます。私は、あなたの助けを求めるためにストラッチス将帥の命令でここに来ました。私たちは租税の盗人を追っています。盗人の船に乗り込み、彼の犯罪に対して異端者を処刑し、アデプトゥス・アルビテスの庇護に聖なる敬意を取り戻さなくてはなりません。本件へのあなたの支援に対する報酬は、ミッションの過程で捕らえる盗人のフリゲート艦『ハートレス』にあります」
languages.original_text: "Thank you for responding to my request, Rogue Trader. I am here on the orders of Marshal Strachs to ask for your help. We are in pursuit of a tithe thief. We must board the thief's ship, execute the heretic for his crimes, and return the sacred tribute to the protection of the Adeptus Arbites. The reward for your assistance in this matter will be the thief's frigate, the Heartless, which we will capture in the course of the mission."

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダー、私の要請に応えてくれてありがとうございます。私は、あなたの助けを求めるためにストラッチス将帥の命令でここに来ました。私たちは租税の盗人を追っています。盗人の船に乗り込み、彼の犯罪に対して異端者を処刑し、アデプトゥス・アルビテスの庇護に聖なる敬意を取り戻さなくてはなりません。本件へのあなたの支援に対する報酬は、ミッションの過程で捕らえる盗人のフリゲート艦『ハートレス』にあります」

languages.text: "Talebime yanıt verdiğiniz için teşekkür ederim Hür Tacir. Miralay Strachs'ın emriyle yardımını istemeye geldim. Bir aşar hırsızının peşindeyiz. Hırsızın gemisini bordalamalı, suçlarından ötürü kâfiri idam etmeli ve kutsal aşarı Adeptus Arbites'in muhafazasına emanet etmeliyiz. Bu husustaki yardımın karşılığında ödülünüz, vazifemizi yerine getirirken ele geçireceğimiz olan Taşkalp adındaki, hırsıza ait fırkateyn olacak."
languages.original_text: "Thank you for responding to my request, Rogue Trader. I am here on the orders of Marshal Strachs to ask for your help. We are in pursuit of a tithe thief. We must board the thief's ship, execute the heretic for his crimes, and return the sacred tribute to the protection of the Adeptus Arbites. The reward for your assistance in this matter will be the thief's frigate, the Heartless, which we will capture in the course of the mission."

traits.locale_text: "Talebime yanıt verdiğiniz için teşekkür ederim Hür Tacir. Miralay Strachs'ın emriyle yardımını istemeye geldim. Bir aşar hırsızının peşindeyiz. Hırsızın gemisini bordalamalı, suçlarından ötürü kâfiri idam etmeli ve kutsal aşarı Adeptus Arbites'in muhafazasına emanet etmeliyiz. Bu husustaki yardımın karşılığında ödülünüz, vazifemizi yerine getirirken ele geçireceğimiz olan Taşkalp adındaki, hırsıza ait fırkateyn olacak."

languages.text: "Danke, dass Ihr auf meine Nachricht reagiert habt, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich bin hier, um Euch auf Befehl von Marschall Strachs um Hilfe zu bitten. Wir verfolgen einen Zehntdieb. Wir müssen das Schiff des Diebes entern, den Ketzer für seine Verbrechen exekutieren und den heiligen Tribut in den Schoß der Adeptus Arbites zurückführen. Der Lohn für Eure Unterstützung in dieser Angelegenheit wäre die Heartless, die Fregatte des Diebes, die wir im Laufe der Mission kapern werden."
languages.original_text: "Thank you for responding to my request, Rogue Trader. I am here on the orders of Marshal Strachs to ask for your help. We are in pursuit of a tithe thief. We must board the thief's ship, execute the heretic for his crimes, and return the sacred tribute to the protection of the Adeptus Arbites. The reward for your assistance in this matter will be the thief's frigate, the Heartless, which we will capture in the course of the mission."
